title: 3dMEPFM
description: Voxelwise deconvolution of Multiecho fMRI data to yield time-varying estimates of changes in transverse relaxation (DR2*) and optionally, net magnetization (DS0)

dr2_output.title: DR2 output volume
dr2_output.description: Changes in R2* parameter, assumed to represent neuronal-related signal changes

dr2fit_output.title: DR2fit output volume
dr2fit_output.description: Convolution of DR2 with HRF, one volume per echo

sigmas_mad_output.title: Sigmas MAD output volume
sigmas_mad_output.description: Estimate of the noise standard deviation after wavelet decomposition for each input dataset

costs_output.title: Costs output volume
costs_output.description: Cost function to select the regularization parameter (lambda) according to selection criterion
